text:
The Career Day is the day when companies have the chance to meet all our participants and select their top candidates to invite for an onsite interview. 

- - -

**5 May 2020,** [**IBM Switzerland Ltd**](https://www.google.ch/maps/place/Vulkanstrasse+106,+8048+Z%C3%BCrich/@47.3934598,8.4837074,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x47900bb9b6441bcf:0x26445d47268f9b0!8m2!3d47.3934562!4d8.4858961)**, ZÃ¼rich**
title: Career Day Zurich
